001package edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
008import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
009import androidx.appcompat.app.ActionBar;
010import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
011import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
012import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.adapter.UserScoresAdapter;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.databinding.FragmentScoresBinding;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.viewmodel.ScoreViewModel;
016
017public class ScoresFragment extends Fragment {
018
019  private FragmentScoresBinding binding;
020  private ScoreViewModel viewModel;
021
022  @Override
023  public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
024    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
025  }
026
027  @Override
028  public View onCreateView(
029      @NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState) {
030    binding = FragmentScoresBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
031    // TODO: 10/17/23 Initialize field contents.
032    return binding.getRoot();
033  }
034
035  @Override
036  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
037    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
038    new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity())
039        .get(ScoreViewModel.class)
040        .getAllScores()
041        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (scores) ->
042            binding.scores.setAdapter(new UserScoresAdapter(requireContext(), scores)));
043  }
044
045}
